segments.text: The girl's posture tells a clear story of eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands on the floor, her gaze fixed on the boy and the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One arm is raised, palm open, a silent plea or command for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the unstable stool, which is a small mercy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her entire being seems to be focused on the moment a cookie will be delivered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s charming to see such focused desire for a simple treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's a clear partner in this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her expectant eyes, wide with hope for a sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a certain innocence to her eagerness, despite the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope her wait isn't in vain, but also that no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene has an almost theatrical quality to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a memorable moment this will be for them, for better or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's worried about being caught at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to trust her brother implicitly with this risky procurement.
segments.speaker: PAR
